meanings.definition: A roofed platform along the outside of a house, level with the ground floor.
meanings.sent1: Our house has beautiful verandahs where we enjoy sitting in the evenings.
meanings.sent2: The verandahs of the old mansion provided a perfect spot for afternoon tea.
meanings.sent3: The verandahs were so long that we could have a race from one end to the other!
meanings.sent4: The verandahs stretched out like welcoming arms, inviting us to relax.
meanings.sent5: The verandahs echoed with the sound of laughter and chatter, creating a cozy atmosphere.
